price: 50. Waxayna tabeeyeen tab, Annaguna waxaanu tabeennay tab, iyagoo aan dareemayn.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
